price: Kugira ngo Tubagerageze ko bashima inema bahawe n’Imana Allah. Uwo wese rero azokwirengagiza kwumviriza no kugendera urwibutso rw’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah rwa Qor’ani, Imana Allah Izomushira mu bihano bikomeye.
arabic: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَمَن يُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابٗا صَعَدٗا

meta.transliteration: linaftinahum fīhi waman yuʿ'riḍ ʿan dhik'ri rabbihi yasluk'hu ʿadhāban ṣaʿadan
